message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period from the income statement.

Looking at the income statement provided, the carrying amount of inventories sold would typically be represented by the "Cost of Goods Sold" line item. This line represents the direct costs attributable to the production of goods sold by the company.

From the income statement dated 2024-01-29, I can see:
- Cost of Goods Sold: 5540000.00

Therefore, the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period is 5540000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '5540000.00'}}
```
